1
 2function [U] = enhance(I, n, m_iter, m_gamma, m_beta, m_tol, m_aTV, m_aL1)
 3
 4constraint = 1; 
 5
 6
 7%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8x = reshape(I,n*n,1);
 9
10L             = 199; 
11[M,Mh,mi,mhi] = LineMask_limitedangleRange(L,n);
12
13
14OMEGA         = mhi;
15OMEGA         = [OMEGA];
16K             = length(OMEGA);
17% A             = @(z) A_fhp(z,OMEGA);
18% At            = @(z) At_fhp(z,OMEGA,n);
19% b             = A(x);
20b= A_fhp(x,OMEGA);
21
22
23
24
25
26OMEGA = [1;OMEGA];
27picks = OMEGA;
28
29F = I;
30[m,n] = size(F);
31FB = fft2(double(F))/sqrt(m*n);
32   
33B = FB(picks);
34WT = []; W = [];
35
36aTV = m_aTV;  
37aL1 = m_aL1;      
38
39%  wav = daubcqf(4);
40 
41 
42% %  W = @(x) midwt(x,wav);
43% %  WT = @(x) mdwt(x,wav);
44% 
45% 
46%   
47%     W = midwt(x,wav);
48%     WT = mdwt(x,wav);
49
50% %%---------------------
51% 
52% opts = [];
53% opts.maxItr     = m_iter;    % max # of iterations
54% opts.gamma      = m_gamma;   
55% opts.beta       = m_beta;       
56% opts.relchg_tol = m_tol;     % stopping tolerance based on relative change
57% opts.real_sol   = true;      
58% opts.normalize  = true;      
59%                             
60% 
61% pick=false(m,n);
62% pick(picks)=true; 
63% 
64% [U,Out_RecPF] = RecPF_constraint(m,n,aTV,aL1,pick,B,2,opts,WT,W,range(I(:)),I,constraint);
65U = 3.14;
66
67return;
68
